00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004   
00005   Snap.h
00006  
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   Create one of these objects at the beginning of a click/drag.
00010   Then, given a time corresponding to the current mouse cursor
00011   position, it will tell you the closest place to snap to.
00012 
00013 **********************************************************************/
00014

00024 class TrackClipArray;

00026 class SnapPoint {
00027  public:
00028    SnapPoint(double t, Track *track) {
00029       this->t = t;
00030       this->track = track;
00031    }
00032    double t;
00033    Track *track;
00034 };
00035 
00036 WX_DEFINE_SORTED_ARRAY(SnapPoint *, SnapPointArray);
00037 
00038 class SnapManager {
00039  public:
00040    SnapManager(TrackList *tracks, TrackClipArray *exclusions,
00041                double zoom, int pixelTolerance);
00042 
00043    ~SnapManager();
00044 
00045    // The track may be NULL.
00046    // Returns true if the output time is not the same as the input.
00047    // Pass rightEdge=true if this is the right edge of a selection,
00048    // and false if it's the left edge.
00049    bool Snap(Track *currentTrack,
00050              double t,
00051              bool rightEdge,
00052              double *out_t);
00053 
00054  private:
00055    double Get(int index);
00056    double Diff(double t, int index);
00057    int Find(double t, int i0, int i1);
00058    int Find(double t);
00059 
00060    double           mEpsilon;
00061    double           mTolerance;
00062    double           mZoom;
00063    SnapPointArray  *mSnapPoints;
00064 };
